attributes.action: Reduce the amount of tax we pay. Increase the amount of tax the rich pay.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to reduce the amount of tax we have to pay because it is too much for many. We want the rich to get taxed more because the amount of tax they pay doesn’t do anything to their wallets.
attributes.background: We want the government to reduce the amount of tax we have to pay by 15%. We want the rich to get taxed 10% more.

rejection.details: If you resubmit your petition you should be clear what tax rates you want to be increased and decreased.
